statements: UPDATE secure_key_exchange SET public_key = '0123456789ABCDEF', private_key = 'FEDCBA9876543210' WHERE user_id = 1;
UPDATE secure_key_exchange SET private_key = '1234567890ABCDEF', public_key = 'FEDCBA0987654321' WHERE user_id = 2;

UPDATE secure_key_exchange SET public_key = '0x04D84D6C5BE8D81D9BEE42A4CD5DCB33244C77C7DAB3C7346FA87FA640AA3253E2921B04FBFBC4AAA425C64EC62C710DC97199CC11AF1C3C843321725B2658E333', private_key = '0x4A7A46A5D8C95F25CBAD02ED1D6724D6F70A6881E3D7D021D3AB58D385679781' WHERE user_id = 1

UPDATE secure_key_exchange SET private_key = '0x9CB00C729E6FD9B20CD3619632815B979E41E93BE41285A2633E246D7D306EBE2E153F5570C46B187F3AA143B0FBDA70F2C9BD0FF2B63D86CE5FDF38A1C6F64A', public_key = '0x04F556689885A93D2D206799535A0F3B034D927EA47193F7EA1B53E1A4A19FB36FE0DFD17E66A88E0A548F9532B654020C42F7F9FBBA7B2F59A4553681BFDED0' WHERE user_id = 2
UPDATE key_exchange SET public_key = 'new_public_key' WHERE key_id = 1;

UPDATE key_exchange_protocol SET encryption_key = 'new_key', date_created = NOW() WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE user_credentials SET password_hash = 'new_password' WHERE username = 'john_doe';
UPDATE key_exchange_protocol SET encryption_key = 'new_encryption_key' WHERE user_id = 123;
UPDATE user_credentials SET password_hash = 'new_password_hash', username = 'new_username' WHERE id = 456;
